title: PipelineEnvelope
description: Wrapper around any hunter pipeline skill output for persistence via hunter-log.

skill.description: The pipeline skill that produced this output.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the output was produced.

input_refs.description: IDs or filename slugs of upstream artifacts this output was derived from. Empty array for first-in-pipeline skills (signal-scan).

output.description: The skill's structured JSON output. Shape varies by skill type -- see per-skill output schemas.
